entries.journal_entry_description: You have been ordered to fly a patrol over to the Gamma outpost. Use the green Space Terminal in the Hangar Bay to access your ship.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You have been ordered to fly a patrol over to the Gamma outpost. Use the green Space Terminal in the Hangar Bay to access your ship.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You've been asked to fly a patrol over to the Gamma Station. If you decide to land on Station Gamma, be aware that it's in a state of chaos and that it may be dangerous.
